name: init_escrow
attributes: # [doc = " 初期化：エスクロー口座を作成し、支払い者と受取人を設定"]
body: let esc = & mut ctx . accounts . escrow ;
esc . initializer = ctx . accounts . payer . key () ;
esc . beneficiary = ctx . accounts . beneficiary . key () ;
msg ! ("Escrow initialized: {} will pay {} lamports to {}" , esc . initializer , esc . amount , esc . beneficiary) ;

name: deposit
attributes: # [doc = " 預入：payer が指定額をエスクロー口座に転送"]
body: * * ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . escrow . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
msg ! ("Deposited {} lamports into escrow" , ctx . accounts . escrow . amount) ;

name: release
attributes: # [doc = " 解放：受取人が資金を引き出す"]
body: * * ctx . accounts . escrow . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . beneficiary . to_account_info () . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += ctx . accounts . escrow . amount ;
msg ! ("Released {} lamports to beneficiary" , ctx . accounts . escrow . amount) ;
